title: Swat font
content:
Hey everyone, i'm looking the name of the official swat font. i don't really have an example of it. I've searched the entire internet for this font but I can't seem to find it. Maybe anyone of you might be more lucky.   
   
tnx
author: skyman

comments.content: There's another post in the Build folder. My question for Jean-Claude is, official for what? S.W.A.T. the movie? Some particular police department? Can you post a sample?

Here's an [answer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214130959/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/24863.html?1075106435) from the archives. It's deals with the movie titles. As for the SWAT Movie logo, I think it was one of the Agency types, perhaps FB's [Agency Black Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214130959/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-agency/agencyfb-blackextended/testdrive.html?s=SWAT&p=48)

This has been up here before, but it seems it's buried in the   
huge chunk of archives (September 23th '03 - June 1st '04   
that inexplicably turned inaccessible a few weeks ago... ![:-(](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214130959im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/sad.gif)

James, how did you access the buried archives? The whole stat   
building process for the Type ID Leader Board grinded to a halt   
when those archives went AWOL, and I'd sure like to be able to   
access them again.
